channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description:
im using a solitude source [ insidia x ]
The wierd old man at barrows doesnt let you click :i would like to fix my barrows " for some reason.. you can click "reset my barrows brothers " and it resets them.. but it wont fix barrows.. how do i fix this? Also same with lottery minigame , i added it in got everything perfect but when i click enter 3m to lottery , it does nothing. how do i make it so it takes 3m out of players inventory if they have it and enters them in lottery. If somebody could help that would be greatt

item.title: Need Help!
